name: STAR-TRITON®
description: STAR-TRITON®  is part of a new generation of pavement sealcoatings that are high performance, effective alternatives, to both refined tar and asphalt emulsion sealers. STAR-TRITON® will perform to the standards you have come to expect from the entire family of STAR sealcoatings. STAR’s formulations use only the highest quality raw materials and STAR-TRITON® is based on carefully selected grades of petroleum resins, minerals, specialty additives and performance boosters, STAR-TRITON® has an extraordinary degree of toughness and water repellency, unmatched by any competitive sealer. STAR-TRITON® forms a tough, durable and flexible coating that protects asphalt pavements from the damaging elements of weather, water penetration, de-icing salts, traffic damage, surface raveling/checking, gasoline and other petrochemical contaminations.
